name: recipesage
description: RecipeSage is a self-hosted recipe manager with tagging, meal planning, ingredient scaling, and import features. It includes a mobile-friendly UI for organizing and cooking at home.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Extract recipes from websites automatically by pasting URLs into the app

features.title: Ingredient Scaling
features.description: Adjust serving sizes and automatically recalculate ingredient quantities

features.title: Meal Planning
features.description: Schedule recipes on a calendar to plan weekly or monthly menus

features.title: Shopping Lists
features.description: Generate grocery lists from planned meals with automatic ingredient aggregation

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize recipes with custom tags like cuisine type, dietary restrictions, or meal type

features.title: Recipe Sharing
features.description: Share favorite recipes with family and friends through shareable links

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Add photos of your finished dishes to personalize recipe cards

features.title: Cooking Mode
features.description: Display recipes in a large, easy-to-read format while cooking in the kitchen
